marklogic.body: Gee, I wonder why smaller conflicts around the world are becoming more Heated? Lets see, it couldn't be that Obama has given them the green light by declaring America will no longer be the leader of the free world. It couldn't be because every Act America has done has been apologized for by Obama. When you have a leader that has a spine of a jelly fish, there isn't much reason to fear about America because they know Obama is gutting our military capability to respond decisively and with purpose.
